#summary Instructions for downloading and installing the QTI Migration Tool

== Downloading and Installing ==

This page contain information about downloading and installing the migration tool.  Once you have done this, move on to [MigGettingStarted Getting Started].

=== Windows ===

Users of Windows should download the Windows installer executable (.exe) featured in the [http://code.google.com/p/qtimigration/downloads/list downloads section of the site].  The installer works in the usual way and will install the QTI Migration Tool executable and supporting files.

=== Mac OS X ===

Users of Mac OS X should download the Mac OS X disk image file (.dmg) featured in the [http://code.google.com/p/qtimigration/downloads/list downloads section of the site].

The disk image contains the QTI Migratino Tool application which can be dropped into the Applications folder in the normal way.

=== Other/Source ===

Other UNIX-based platforms should use the source distribution instead (currently by checking out the trunk of the source tree).
